data.question: What is the empirical formula of 1ADCu?
What method was used to measure the a.c. impedance of vertical MOC arrays?
What is the significance of the cis configuration in the growth mechanism of 1ADCu NWs?
data.answer: The cis configuration allows the face-on addition of precursors for nanowire elongation by exposing one side of the Cu-S plane free of steric hindrance.

data.question: True or False: The 1ADCu NWs have a solid inorganic core consisting of a three-atom cross-section.
What is the role of diamondoid structure-directing agents in the synthesis of hybrid metal-organic chalcogenide nanowires?
data.answer: Diamondoid structure-directing agents guide the growth of hybrid metal-organic chalcogenide nanowires with solid inorganic cores.

data.question: True or False: The bandgap of 1ADCu is larger than that of 4DICu.
What is the width of the first valence band (VB) of 1ADCu?
True or False: The resistivity of 1ADCu can be modulated by doping with H2O2.
How does the size and shape of the diamondoid affect the growth of MOCs?
data.answer: The size and shape of the diamondoid tune the van der Waals and steric interactions, modulating the inorganic bonding and affecting the growth of MOCs.

data.question: True or False: The crystal structure of 4DICu consists of a solid-core nanowire similar to 1ADCu.
What is the resistivity of 1ADCu nanowire?
True or False: The electronic transport in MOCs occurs within single wires with a low probability of charge hopping between adjacent NWs.
What is the effect of doping 1ADCu with H2O2 on its electrical conductivity?
data.answer: Doping 1ADCu with H2O2 decreases its resistivity by approximately three orders of magnitude as the H2O2 concentration is increased up to 104 ppm.

data.question: True or False: The diamondoid-directed assembly method can be extended to synthesize MOCs with inorganic cores of Cd-S, Zn-S, and Fe-Se.
What is the role of tributylphosphine (TBP) in the synthesis of iron(II) adamantane-1-selenolate?
data.answer: TBP facilitates the formation of Fe-Se bonds without incorporation into the crystal structure.

data.question: True or False: The optical bandgap for 1ADCu as measured by ultraviolet-visible absorption spectroscopy is 2.5 eV.
What is the effective carrier mass of hole carriers at the VBM of 1ADCu?
data.answer: Close to one electron rest mass

data.question: True or False: The band structures of 1ADCu and 4DICu show large band dispersion along the chain elongation directions.
How does the doping process affect the crystal structure of 1ADCu?
data.answer: The doping process partially oxidizes the copper in 1ADCu from the C1 to the C2 state without changing the lattice spacing.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of copper-based MOCs involves the reduction of copper from the C2 to the C1 oxidation state.
